question: What is the GDP growth rate of India in the next fiscal year 2020-21, as predicted by the Fitch Ratings?
explanation:
Global ratings agency Fitch Ratings has estimated that Indiaâ€™s economy would bounce back with a steep growth rate of 9.5 per cent in the next fiscal year.
Earlier, Fitch ratings had forecasted that the GDP growth of India would contract at 5 percent in the ongoing fiscal year starting April 2020. It has also highlighted that 9.5 % growth is possible only if the country avoids further deterioration in financial sector health.
